paragraph: John Herndon is an American instrumental hip hop producer from Chicago, Illinois.

John Herndon is a drummer of the bands Tortoise and Isotope 217. He produced Deep Puddle Dynamics' song entitled "More from June" in 2002. He released the Missing Dragons EP under the alias A Grape Dope on Galaxia in 2003. It features a guest appearance from rapper Doseone.
Deep Puddle Dynamics - "More from June" from We Ain't Fessin' (Double Quotes) (2002)
Themselves - "You Devil You" and "Hat in the Wind" from The No Music (2002)
Doseone - "By Horoscope Light I&II" from Ha (2005)
Tommy Guerrero  - "Birds Over Head (John Herndon Remix)" from Junk Collector (2001)
Themselves - "Dr. Moonorgun Please" from The No Music of AIFFS (2003)
